pros: Good deal for a large quantity of magnets
Good holding power, especially for the fridge
cons: Not coated so leaves some residue

customer_reviews.title: Super strong for size !!!
customer_reviews.text: These little magnets are perfect for my concrete magnets. They hold extremely well with a small drop of E6000 glue . I highly recommend these magnets. Their true size is about the width of a dime and as thick as3 dimes together. We certainly be reordering lots more. Have already placed and received second order!!! Couldn't be happier with these magnets !! Our second order and can't explain how strong these are. Add alittle drop of E6000 glue and your magnet is secured and ready to hold your item a at least four pieces of paper or two Extre large post cards.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sinisi

customer_reviews.title: These little guys are really strong!!!
customer_reviews.text: These little guys are really strong!!! I wanted them to built a make up storage wall and the perform extraordinarily!! The hold the weight very well just with a dab of hot glue. I really have to pull them!. They are so inexpensive that I'm looking forward to buy more and experiment more projects with them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: NenaLiu

customer_reviews.title: Decent pull for size
customer_reviews.text: You can't complain too much about the magnetic pull from these due to their small size. It's pretty much what I expected and have been used to hold up sheets of paper or notes to the fridge. Holiday cards were a bit more dicey with heavier weight paper stock putting a bit more strain on keeping things in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok magnets
customer_reviews.text: Ok magnets at a pretty good price. I use them in my 8th grade science classroom to build shake generators. They're also useful keeping stuff stuck to my whiteboards! update: I bought two boxes of these magnets. After using them with my students for two weeks, at least 25% of the magnets are broken. I'm unsure if this is an issue with the quality of these magnets, or something common to all ceramic disc magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome strong magnets! Box broken, most magnets missing...:(
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are strong, one will hold a good size 8x10 photo!! I have a giant magnetic wall and I absolutely love them! There was one BIG problem...the box was broken open upon delivery and I received only 35 magnets!!! Super disappointed in the cheap shipping box, the magnets are heavy, they need a much better box for shipping. I would like the entire 120 pieces which I ordered and paid for. I would have given them a 5 star but for the broken box and missing magnets.
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl6

customer_reviews.title: Company was prefect with their description and
customer_reviews.text: Have to say I was unsure of ordering these cause I wasn't sure it would be perfect for what I wanted them for. But reading the description. Which was spot on. I ordered them and they were prefect. Exactly what I was looking for and worked perfect for how I wanted to use them. Trust me I don't usually like to write the reviews but this place was straight in with the Info of the item and they worked prefect. I know I'll be using this company again and will totally refer others. Great job guys and keep up the great work. Thank you again for the hrs work yiu do to make sure customers are happy
customer_reviews.author: chris depaolis

customer_reviews.title: Buy stainless steel ones instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to the description noting how powerful they were. They are actually less powerful than my old stainless steel ones half the size. They also do not increase in strength much when stacked. I use them to find nails in sheet rock as sort of a stud finder. These struggled where my old magnets found the nail easily. Also I dropped one and it broke in half immediately. Should have bought steel.
customer_reviews.author: Majog

customer_reviews.title: Variety of uses for us
customer_reviews.text: Used these puppies to turn the side of my fridge into a spice rack. Can't beat the cabinet space it freed up! My husband has also used them to teach science labs. All-around handy item to have in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Arrive crushed, don’t hold at all.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worthless. First, they’re black, not gray. Second, almost 1/4-1/3 arrived either crushed or broken in half. What the heck happened in shipment?!? Third, the remaining ones I glued onto little craft blocks, and not ONE of them will hold it onto the fridge. It took THREE to hold a small block onto the fridge. What the heck?! I’ve had stick-on sheet magnet strips that were FAR superior. These are terrible quality. I’ve requested a full refund, but I’m still left with 80 small blocks that are completely ruined now. If you’re wanting magnets to hold anything more than a feather weight, these are NOT for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hsummers

customer_reviews.title: Good strong grade
customer_reviews.text: Comes in 4 rows, no adhesives, has positive and negative reaction when using 2 magnets on each other, can be applied to anything metal (not sure about steel, aluminum, or copper). Exact size and thickness of 3 dimes put together, not strong when thin cardboard is put in between magnets and metal (hint: magnets came in a small, white, narrow cardboard box).
customer_reviews.author: Ttiana

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets but not neodymium.
customer_reviews.text: Note these are not neodymium magnets so are nowhere near as strong as those style of magnets so take the strength claim with a grain of salt if you are used to neodymium's pull. these can be easily separated by pulling apart without the need to slide so are more useful for when you want a physically larger magnet with a bit less pull say if you are working with children or want to make fridge paper holder magnets but don't want to be able to hold a comic book to the fridge 🤣 reflecting their strength these are also considerably cheaper than the similar size and number of news would be.
customer_reviews.author: Someone who cares

customer_reviews.title: Good value, strong magnets.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect shape. These have good holding power for their size. These are much stronger than the typical ceramic craft magnets that you find. These worked perfectly to make thumbprint animal refrigerator magnets in my granddaughters 2nd grade class. We used these on the back on 1.5 inch glass "buttons" and they have no issues holding tight on the fridge with several layers of paper. We thought that we would have to coat them but these are very low marking on paper when slid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Guth

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, would purchase again. It's respectably strong, in other words stronger than the average quality fridge magnet without being so strong you can'tpick it off. The size is good for multiple uses and it doesnt have a cheap crackly coating.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Etc.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very  strong
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my magnetic makeup vanity and I love them! I got some magnetic stickers once that didn't hold for crap, I decided to get these specifically because they are thick and many of my makeup compacts have a dip that make some magnets useless. They are VERY strongand are held in place by a tiny drop of E600, will buy more if (when) my makeup collection gets bigger
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for geocaching
customer_reviews.text: I got these for use in geocaching and I'm very pleased with them. They are plenty powerful enough to hold my cache container securely in place but not to the ridiculous point where you can't get the cache off where you have it magnetized to. They are about 2/3" in diameter & fit into everything I need them to fit into. I'm telling my geocaching friends about this product--they work too well not to share!
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, handy magnets that dont chip when snapped together and dont rust
customer_reviews.text: . I use them everywhere - from kitchen magnets to science projects. stacked for more power they work great as workshop everything holders. Good communication from the seller; couldnt ask for more. A great buy - I'll be a return customer.
customer_reviews.author: TryItFixItTryIt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnets
customer_reviews.text: Me and my son decided to build a truck bed tent, one problem was how could we secure the canopy onto the bed of the track. Through some research we found that one easy way to get the fabric stay in place around the car was to use magnets. After some searching and buying another brand magnets we finally received these, and they worked excellent. They are quite strong, and good size - just as advertised. One of the magnets was with a small piece chopped off when they arrived, but that was fine for what I needed the magnets for.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoli R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong little magnets
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for a fridge magnet project and they seem to fit the bill just fine. They have a dimple to tell you with pole is which, and they seem pretty strong for most magnetic surfaces. I only had trouble sticking them to a whiteboard but I think the problem was the whiteboard NOT the magnets as they stick to the fridge and other metal surfaces quite strongly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Cap Magnets
customer_reviews.text: Magnets arrived with no broken pieces. Came in a plain small white box that they were stacked in. The magnets are a little dirty so I recommend wiping them with a baby wipe or wet paper towel prior to putting them on the fridge. I used them for bottle cap magnets. I used superglue as an adhesive and it worked great. There is a little bit of gap between the bottle cap magnet and the surface it will be magnetized to. I think I’m going to use some felt to fill that gap. If you are looking to do bottle cap magnets, I recommend a slightly bigger depth. These will work though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive craft/vision board magnets
customer_reviews.text: You'll definitely need to clean these upon receipt (dirty/greasy in box), and true to ceramic, may be a tad brittle for some projects, but overall, a good value if you're planning on using them for crafts and/or white board/refrigerator magnets. They are dull grey in color, but work remarkable well as curtain (shower or window) weights, and make for easy revisions on vision/white boards. Inexpensive magnets for your crafts, I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: fajita

customer_reviews.title: Recommended purchase
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are incredible. The weight capacity has been more then what I was hoping for. Came in a plane white box and didn’t realize what they were until I opened it but other then that they’re an amazing value and out did all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Verminski

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, attractive, strong
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are NOT the cheap magnets you get at craft stores (you know the ones, they will barely hold themselves up on the fridge, let alone several sheets of paper) these are solid, strong magnets that are big enough so you don't have to pry them off with a fingernail, but strong enough to actually work if you glue them to a fridge decoration. They are also a nice steel color instead of gummy black. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent magnets for the fridge and crafts
customer_reviews.text: The magnets are strong and a perfect size for refrigerator magnets and for crafts with the kids. I took off a star because they are a bit dirty - you definitely have to wash you hands after handling them, and they are brittle - a few of them broke in half or chipped quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russo

customer_reviews.title: strong basic magnet
customer_reviews.text: These are satisfactory, good value for the money, one or two can hold up a ceramic magnet, easily holds up basic resin pieces too. Only issue is they attract eachother like crazy, which I guess attests to its strength lol, BUT when you are securing themndown you have to have the spaced apart adequately haha
customer_reviews.author: m. chvz

customer_reviews.title: but they can break easily. I double them up and glue them together ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well, but they can break easily. I double them up and glue them together with E6000. Once glued, they haven't broken and are very strong.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Bessenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Useful and strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making DIY magnets. Very strong and well made for fridge use. Lots of possibility for craft items. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because I like collecting car emblems and decided that I wanted to display them. Glued these to both emblems and license plates and they worked great. The north side of the magnet is marked. It has a beveled edge to prevent damage to whatever you stick them to. Cheap and effective. They are pretty darn strong for their size. A+
customer_reviews.author: Zach smith

customer_reviews.title: Super Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, just what I needed for my Christmas display train layout. Didn't want to permanently attach street lamps and this was the answer. Pretty strong for their size. Way more then I needed but at a little over 8 cents a piece I couldn't pass up the deal. Plenty of other uses for these.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Gyuga

customer_reviews.title: Magnets Everywhere !
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize until I opened the package what a large quantity of magnets it was.....this is a top quality set that was delivered promptly and neatly packaged. Super useful around the house and the workshop, and I'm very happy with this product. There is more than enough to cover your needs so you can give extras to friend or family, take them to school, etc... Highly recommended, and will definitely buy items from this vendor
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Buret

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnetic Holding
customer_reviews.text: These are great magnets. Tried to use the magnetic tape for projects; but, barely held on the refrigerator until the door closed. These magnets hold perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: GAL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome multi-use magnets
customer_reviews.text: We use these magnets in a variety of ways at the Youth Empowerment Zone, including experiments and games, as well as in vehicles for hanging signage. Thus far we have been satisfied with them, and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: They really are super strong!
customer_reviews.text: I needed magnets strong enough to hold the heavy glass and metal refrigerator magnets I make and these work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Feathersong

customer_reviews.title: very strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets worked well for our project using 1 inch glass stones. These were strong enough to hold the stones along with a few pieces of paper. Great value for the price, too.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets are handy around the house
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty strong magnets and I use them 4 lots of product projects around the house. I use the handle and hardware from an old dust mop and attached a piece of hardboard to the bottom. I used a glue gun 2 glue several of these magnets to the bottom. I use it to pick up pins that fall on the floor. I'm finding other uses for them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Terre M.

customer_reviews.title: Good but DIRTY.
customer_reviews.text: They’re fine, but they are DIRTY. Not like, a little dusty, they are DIRTY with some sort of oil or something. You have to clean them individually on all sides before using. You will have to wash your hands after. Did I mention dirty?
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets for home projects.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for made-at-home fridge magnets, or repairing them. They attach easily with hot glue or superglue. You need to wipe them off first though to make them stick well. Good strength for their size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: strong magnets to hold up glitter
customer_reviews.text: these magnets work great. I use them to hold up jars of glitter on a steel sheet so that I can see what I have (plus it's a pretty display). none of the magnets has jumped off the wall, although sometimes the glue I use doesn't stick very well and pops off when I try to get a jar off the wall. Obviously this is of no fault to the magnet, just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda J Ruddiman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rock magnets!
customer_reviews.text: My girls and I used these magnets to hot glue onto the smaller rocks we collected. They made amazing gifts for our relatives! Note: The Clemson rock was too heavy for the magnet to hold up but I knew that was a long shot. All other slightly smaller rocks worked just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarrowind

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly strong.
customer_reviews.text: Glued, with Krazy Glue, the magnets to the back of the glass rounds, which I had the kids 'paint,' the backs of and made refrigerator magnets. Turned out well
customer_reviews.author: RainDance

customer_reviews.title: They were the perfect size for the project I needed them for and ...
customer_reviews.text: These magnets worked perfectly! They were the perfect size for the project I needed them for and the magnetic field is very strong, but not so strong that my students couldn't take them off the board when they needed to. I would definitely recommend these and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Slovak

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets- all arrived intact!
customer_reviews.text: Great multi-purpose magnets. They are strong and a nice size. I use them camping. They are great for holding all manner of things and won't damage your tent. All were interact when they arrived- some were covered in fine magnet "dust". Other reviews from different sellers have sometimes mentioned breakage. This was not a problem for my order.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnywolf

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: They are very strong magnets compared to most that I can purchase in the arts & crafts store locally. I use them to make glass gem magnets and they hold through the glass pebble. Holds multiple papers on the fridge plus no problem holding the glass pebble.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Place

customer_reviews.title: VERY powerful! Also very durable.
customer_reviews.text: These are VERY powerful, not easily chipped, heat resistant and easy to use, because the N pole is always marked. GREAT deal for the price! Much more powerful than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: goldenskyhook

customer_reviews.title: Too weak
customer_reviews.text: These possessed very little magnetic ability,. This would be good for something with a weight of tissue paper or loose leaf paper. I wanted to make a wood board that had rows of these magnets on the back to hold up scissors or small screw drivers, etc. I used 4 rows of these separated by an inch or so. Board did not hold anything. Long ago, I ordered magnetic name tags which were 10x stronger than these. Too late to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best craft magnets!
customer_reviews.text: This are the best craft magnets that I have purchased. I used them on the back of handmade crocheted refrigerator butterflies. I glued them on with industrial glue and they work perfect. Good price for 120 magnets!
customer_reviews.author: Headphone crazy

customer_reviews.title: They are however great for using in husbands workshop
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for magnets that were really thin to use with fabric. While these are definitely strong magnets, they were not thin enough for the intended project, nor were they polished enough to avoid discoloring the fabric. They are however great for using in husbands workshop. Thanks for making these available.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Bethoc

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets seem pretty standard. They are very strong. One of the magnets I received was broken into two pieces but it was fine - I didn't need all the magnets in the box anyway (but that's the reason for 4 vs 5 stars). The north pole is marked on each magnet which is helpful. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: HereForTheCheese

customer_reviews.title: I glued one or two to the backs on my paints and they work great! Much cheaper and just as strong as pricey ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to hold my face painting supplies in my kit. I glued one or two to the backs on my paints and they work great! Much cheaper and just as strong as pricey earth magnets. Just to be clear my face painting case is almost like a rolling suitcase, it just tossed around and bumped alot and none of the magnets have fallen off!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Woah! Strong little things!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are so strong! They are small but hold well! I glued a ceramic cross onto them and they held up nicely. The ceramic crosses are on the heavy side. I will use these for a lot of my arts and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: Yacs

customer_reviews.title: Super strong!
customer_reviews.text: I was making my own magnets, and these are great. My only warning is they are so strong when i was gluing them a few was too close together and they zinged off the glue and towards each other. So make sure you spread out your materials if they include drying time
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great little magnets
customer_reviews.text: These little magnets worked great for what I needed them for. They will be perfect for other craft ideas! They are surprisingly strong for there size.
customer_reviews.author: Bushwhacker

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect-very happy
customer_reviews.text: These do exactly what I both wanted and needed. The only downside is they have a fine powder on them. When first used each magnet will dust your fingers in black. But it washes easily and everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnets will hold weight
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are a great size and hold the weight. I use them to make refrigerator magnets and also use them to hold small tools and they are great and nothing slips. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are incredibly strong!! They arrived quickly and in good condition. Yes they stick together and have held up to everything I have used them for. They even hold up small tools!
customer_reviews.author: D White

customer_reviews.title: Small, extremely magnetic!
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered in a timely manner. They are heavy and appear to be very magnetic. We bought them to put on our mailbox door as the latch broke. We haven’t had a chance to make the repair. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.White

customer_reviews.title: Size & magnification perfect
customer_reviews.text: The grid on my grill was too close to the coals, hence burnt meat. I stacked all 4 posts with 10 magnets, the size is identical. They work great, I got results I was looking for. 1 question. What can I put on top of the top magnet so it doesn't get magnified to the grid ? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Scranton Penna

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in time and as described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter's slime themed birthday party. One of the slimes was a "magnetic" slime, so I bought these for the kids to take home with the slime. They arrived in a timely manner and as described.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty strong
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well. I mostly use them to hold my measuring cups to the fridge. It takes 4 of them to hold up the 1 cup size. I wish they were a little stronger but they work. A lot stronger than what you'd find in the store.
customer_reviews.author: KMom

customer_reviews.title: It helps
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to glue to the back of my phone case so, i can stick my phone to my machines at work ie no more dropped phone. Only problem now is which machine I left it stuck too hmmmmm
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets that won't slide or move on their own.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are being used to hold presentations to magnetic walls. These are super strong and hold several large pages easily. They are a good size for gripping and moving, as they are not tiny. This is my fourth order of them and I anticipate I will be ordering more, as so many of my work colleagues prefer these. For the size, quantity, cost and quality, I was very pleased with these. I did have trouble ordering larger quantities at the bulk rate and had to place several smaller orders to get the quantity I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Urbanek

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Really strong magnets. Look shinier than the picture shows. They look more dull than shiny but, they can hold weight. For reference, I am holding car license plates on a refrigerator with just 2 and you have to apply force to get them off. Previous attempts with other magnets failed due to lack of magnetism.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are working well holding down tarps to steel shelving racks. I couldn't keep outdoor critters from getting into my storage shelves so I hung a tarp from a top rail and used the magnets to go down the sides and across the bottom, no more critters. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Best value for your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! I'm using them to hold up items in my bath room to get stuff off the counter, but they are plenty strong. They are black though. Not silver like the picture. Not that I'm complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Hidden

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly strong magnets.
customer_reviews.text: Good strong magnets. Beveled edges so they won’t scratch. Very happy and have reordered.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe Commodore The Gootch!

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets were good and strong! They work very well and we were please. They were a better price and much stronger than the strongest ones we purchased at the craft store.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Strong small magnets
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my remotes since I constantly misplace them. Using double sided tape. I just place a magnet on the back of each remote and attach the remotes to a metal strip when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: APC Houston

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet but beware when broken
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely strong. However, if you need to break them in half for the backs of little baby magnet crafts or something like that, you will get black stuff all over your hands and over whatever you touch. My niece was able to break them so they do break easily, so if giving to kids for craft projects just keep an eye on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: I find work the best for my project
customer_reviews.text: Just what I have been looking for.. Many magnets on the market, but these, I find work the best for my project... The quality, quantity and the price made it easier to choose these magnets above the others... Should My project be a success I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brinkmann

customer_reviews.title: Not the magnets you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as I was hoping. I guess they would work ok for some small arts and crafts jobs, though. Be careful: if you let them go from over an inch away (seriously, ONE INCH), they tend to shatter upon impact. Now I have tiny, sharp pieces of magnet all over the place. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and very attractive!
customer_reviews.text: The magnets were shipped quickly. They were exactly as described in the description. They are almost as big around as a penny and a little thicker than a nickel just for reference. They appear to have good strength considering that they are small. If needed, I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: They are very strong. Exactly what I wanted and very well described.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good holding power
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are great they have good holding power and I like that they have a dimple to indicate polarity. I use them for lots things around the workshop. I just made a set of window shades for my van and these work fantastically for easy install and removal.
customer_reviews.author: Poppabear

customer_reviews.title: Very strong. Excellent quality. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Super, duper strong magnets!!! I use them to make refrigerator magnets out of marble mosiac tile. Strong enough to hold up the tile and several sheets of paper. No broken pieces. Best magnets on Amazon. I've purchased several times and will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: CIN

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Magnets are working great. Happy I purchase as there are so many for small price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my nosework kits and they work great! Much better deal versus buying them in the store. They came packed well and none were broken. I'll be buying them again! -Jen
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Super strong.. great value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for.. such a great price . These magnets are around the size of a nickel and super strong!! Would buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Lowe

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty dang strong
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty dang strong. They have the diameter of maybe a nickel. The mark to distinguish between poles is really helpful as we were using these in an art project with kids and the mark helped them understand how magnets work.
customer_reviews.author: rien c

customer_reviews.title: A little weaker than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine. I would have hoped for a stronger magnet. It works. I’m using it to hold up simple usb cables . That works just fine but it doesn’t take much for them to shake loose. I was able to easily super glue them to my cable retainer if that’s worth anything
customer_reviews.author: John M Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are strong! I use them for flower magnets that I make. I’ve used it on a mini mason jar which is glass, with a small flower in it and it holds up well. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ella

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These are overpriced but they do hold up my DIY marble magnets. However, they are not overly strong to hold up more than one or two pieces of paper on the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and grip!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding my cross-stitch pattern pages to the metal board, without blocking any of the pattern. Very strong magnetic grip and if I need more I will certainly order these again! Price is unbeatable with quick shipping and very good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Living The Dream

customer_reviews.title: Got magnets?
customer_reviews.text: Hoop of magnets! I'm not sure what I'm going to use all of them for. These should last me for a long time. On top of that, they are powerful little guys.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bibler

customer_reviews.title: Afford great strenght magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are a great affordable way to add magnets to your crafts. They adhere strongly to metallic surfaces. They are small enough to be easy to accommodate and have a wide range of uses. And with the low cost for the quantity it's an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a project in my sons room. We made wooden hangers for posters, and i used these to hold these posters on. That way we would be able to switch posters ou whenever and not have any damage to them. These magnets are very strong and hold the weight. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality and hold several pieces of paper up in ...
customer_reviews.text: These magnets were just what I was looking for. They are good quality and hold several pieces of paper up in my cubical. They are about the size of a penny and the thickness of 2-3 pennies stacked. The price point was also excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for workshop jigs
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. I plan to use these in making jigs for my workshop. They will hold jigs in place without screws or clamps once I glue them into recesses I plan to drill.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing magnets! I got these to make fridge magnets and they hold so well! They don't scratch the surface and they have a bit of strength to them so they don't fall off the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Alexxa

customer_reviews.title: Strong but not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are strong magnets. I bought them to attach screen to my car windows for camping. They serve the purpose. Stronger than a typical frig magnet but not amazing. No, putting two together does not make it stronger!
customer_reviews.author: LISA HOLMBERG

customer_reviews.title: The price was great, especially for teachers like me who many times ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets to use for my classroom bulletin boards and they were as strong as the company promised. The price was great, especially for teachers like me who many times pay for supplies out of their own pockets. I will buy from this company again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are very strong and easy to use. They adhere to glue well. Love that they have the little divots to indicate polarity. Our small business will definitely be purchasing these magnets again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These are very strong and heavy. I think I will use them for a much more heavy-duty project because they are stronger than I thought they would be. Very nice magnets!
customer_reviews.author: k8

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little magnets that are very strong. I used these magnets to hold up a curtain on a metal frame.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Using them to hold my spice containers under the cabinet and off the counter. Keep away from your electronics!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: They stick to metal.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets were purchased for a buddy of mine to hold up plastic sheets inside of his spraybooth. So far I believe they are working well. I’m taking no news as good news. If they didn’t work I’m sure I would have heard some complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent magnets I wanted something a little stronger but for the amount you get it's pretty good
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: set of 16 multi purpose magnets free  Order# 111-0105025-6714620
customer_reviews.text: super strong magnets. Perfect for all my activities. I have tried many magnets claiming to be strong, but this one actually is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: cactusrose

customer_reviews.title: Works great for office walls with fabric covering metal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my office cubicle walls that have fabric covering metal panels and can't take pins. I was a bit worried about if they could hold papers plus with the cloth covering. A bit of testing showed that a single magnet could hold up to 10 pages of 8.5x11 papers. The size is perfect and doesn't take up took much space.
customer_reviews.author: McKindle

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great for what I needed them for and seem very ...
customer_reviews.text: These work as stated. down one start because in the pic they show them for silvery.. but in reality they are the typical dark back ceramic and have a lot of dust particles on them that get on your hands? Otherwise great for what I needed them for and seem very strong.
customer_reviews.author: CRC

customer_reviews.title: Not Strong
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are touted as being super strong, grade 11, whatever that's supposed to mean and these are NOT strong magnets in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Ristvedt

customer_reviews.title: Great for science projects
customer_reviews.text: Great for science projects. Also used for attaching blind wooden shades to the top of the blinds, where velcro or plastic attachments just never worked reliably. These magnets are so strong, by glueing a couple of these magnets to the wooden shade you can reliably attach them to the iron brackets that hold the shades. So easy. Easy to attach, adjust its position and remove for cleaning as needed. Quite strong attractive force and material does not break if dropped by accident as found with some super magnets
customer_reviews.author: Brian C Leslie
